version_description:
Meet a bigger update:
— Plants now have their inventories where you can keep stuff.
— Snakies can now protect plants.
— Any moment now these items will become available for shopping:
— Batteries (they boost gold production)
— Genies (they can pick up 3 items from far away)
— Updated Gift boxes and Zombie boxes (more chances for great loot)
— UI tweaks
— A couple of new icons
— A couple of new sounds
— Bug fixes

— UI tweaks
— A couple of new icons
— A couple of new sounds
— Bug fixes

Hey! This version brings UI tweaks, bug fixes, several bot icons, redesigned Store. Also, a glimpse of a new divine sound world of Cheapshot, thanks Oa!
Oh, and abandoned buildings look better.

Happy New Year! Update Cheapshot to get a few UI tweaks, bug fixes, under the hood improvements.
+ A new positive confirmation when there's nothing to steal.
+ Map sounds go into the background as you zoom out.

— several new sounds by Oa,
— optimized bag experience: new items are highlighted and appear on the top,
— a new screen for poor location accuracy,
— UI tweaks and optimizations.

Under the hood improvements and bug fixes

1. Introducing Boost button: double your plant money output for one hour!
2. Equip better mods first when you long tap on/off switch
3. New map animations
4. Performance improvements
5. Bug fixes
Under the hood improvements
Now you can see your bots and other players leveling up! Right on the map. This update also brings under-the-hood improvements and bug fixes. Have a great day!
Introducing notifications with sounds! Check the game settings. Also, minor improvements and bug fixes.

Introducing Chat history! Swipe down the notification stack to see all the messages in your area. Wow!

— displaying up to three messages on the left at once,
— minor UI enhancements
— whale icon tweaks

What's new:
- Introducing Proximity sensor! It will buzz whenever a player appears in your latest position so you can go online and say Hi
- Long tap to buy snakes (Finally!)
- More tweaks and improvements

We are a location-based game but now we encourage you to take self-isolation measures and to only leave home if absolutely necessary. Also, don't forget to follow your local guidelines. Stay safe!
